message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that price for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product. I'm really interested in it, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand your concerns about budget, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $105. It's a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you. I'm confident you'll love it!

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above $105. I'd be willing to pay $98 for the product. I think that's a fair price, considering the product's value and our previous discussions.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $102. It's a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you and our previous discussions. I'm confident we can reach an agreement!

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $98, but I was thinking more along the lines of $97. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.

I understand your desire to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $99. It's a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you and our previous discussions. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement!
